channel.title: Comments on: Shudder to Think reunites at NYC show*

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: i awoke from my nap today to catch the tail end of that show that used to be on vh1 (now vh1 classic, of course) w/ aamer halem [sic?] - "bands reunited." this was the information society episode. long story short, it didn't happen...kurt harland didn't even show up. sometimes reunions don't happen. i'd like to hear more stories like that. everyone else looked so sad and hurt. it was awesome! turns out InSoc does have a new disc out though: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Synthesizer_%28album%29
item.content:encoded:
i awoke from my nap today to catch the tail end of that show that used to be on vh1 (now vh1 classic, of course) w/ aamer halem [sic?] – “bands reunited.” this was the information society episode. long story short, it didn’t happen…kurt harland didn’t even show up. sometimes reunions don’t happen. i’d like to hear more stories like that. everyone else looked so sad and hurt. it was awesome! turns out InSoc does have a new disc out though:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Synthesizer_%28album%29
